markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Transmutation](/Rules.aspx?ID=269)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 298 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
[Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157) spells make alterations to or transform the physical form of a creature or object. The [morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113) and [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) traits appear primarily in transmutation spells.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Transmutation
search_markdown:
<additional-info>

Chapter 7: Spells / Magical Schools
</additional-info>
text: Transmutation Source Core Rulebook pg. 298 4.0 Transmutation spells make alterations to or transform the physical form of a creature or object. The morph and polymorph traits appear primarily in transmutation spells.
